OrgName.entry: CRISIS RESOLUTION AND HOME TREATMENT SERVICE

AltName.entry: CRISIS ASSESSMENT HOME TREATMENT SERVICE (FORMER NAME)

Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Health and Social Care NHS Foundation Trust. The service offers a mental health assessment with strategies to manage immediate crisis. It is also responsible for Mental Health Act assessments outside of normal working hours. Offers home treatment as an alternative to in-patient services and intensive short-term interventions by nurses, social workers, consultant psychiatrists, occupational therapists, support time and recovery workers. Can arrange referrals to mainstream services where specialist help can be arranged. The service can only be accessed by a GP, emergency GP, an Accident and Emergency Department, NHS Direct or other health care workers.
